title: Can I use arihant's chapterwise solved papers 2018-2009 instead of arihant's 2020-2011 (for 2020-2021 class 12 board exams)? What is the difference in every year's new book? .. (so basically is it not good enough to use it)? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Every year books will some what change but concept is same we just urilixt those concept it will favour you.definitely arihant CBSE Class 12 chapter wise Books are by far the best books for scoring good marks in the CBSE Class 12 board exam. You can easily score above 90% marks simply by practicing all the questions given in the arihant chapterwise book all by yourself. “ For more tips use some apps like toppr etc” .
